phrs.translation: 呼气, 呼出, 喷气, 蒸发
呼出阀, 呼气阀, 吸气阀, 呼吸阀
呼出时间, 呼出具体时间

sentences.sentence: Utter the word "calm" in your mind with every exhalation.
sentences.translation: 在你的内心浮想“平静”这个词。

sentences.sentence: He yawned in reverse: first an exhalation, then an inhalation.
sentences.translation: 他打了个哈欠：先呼气，后吸气。

sentences.sentence: With an exhalation, bring your feet up, keeping your knees bent near your chest.
sentences.translation: 随着呼气，抬起你的双脚，双膝弯曲着靠近胸腔。
